amendment.description: To increase appropriations for Head Start programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2254 proposed by Senator Dodd.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2254.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2254 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2254 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 272.
Amendment SA 2254 ruled out of order by the chair.
